title: Bella Sara Digitala Arkiv
footer_maininfos:
För frågor, kommentarer, eller hjälp:
@Archiving i Bella Sara Discord eller öppna en diskussion på Our Github
devlog_summary:
Here is the current state of the archiving of the Bella Sara website games:

We have successfully managed to locate and restore several of the original Flash games from the Bella Sara website. These include Cloud Jumper, Treasure's Hunt, Jigsaw Puzzle, Coloring Game (Fiona only), Memory Game, Santo's Quiz, the Baby Bella ad, and the old version of the World Map.

Additionally, we have partially recovered or restored the files for several other games, such as the Art Studio, Lance Riding, Storybook, My Horse (sprite only), Firelight Festival, and the newer version of the World Map. These games are still undergoing work to fully restore their original functionalities, and many games are missing files (e.g., the Lance Riding game is missing the files for the later levels).

Unfortunately, some games remain missing or seem to be permanently broken (e.g., Bella's Beauty Box). To address this, we have started recreating a few of these games using the Phaser framework. As of this update, the Stables, the Spectacular Jumping Game, Yin and Yang's Memory Game and Belo's Quizare all available to play, although still as a work in progress. We are also currently working on recreating Citrustacked, Bellapedia, and Bellisimo's Jumping Contest, which should all hopefully be available soon.

Beyond restoring the original games, we have also started creating custom games inspired by the ones from the website. Currently, two are available: a Random Art Idea Generator, a Dress-Up Game based on the Stables and an Adventures Quiz and Autumn Journey Quiz based on Belo's Quiz.

We do hope to eventually restore or recreate all the games from the site if we can, but this will obviously take time. If you would like to help us out or would like a more detailed overview of this project, we would recommend starting here: Bella Sara Archival Notes. This project is a community effort and every little bit helps!
play_recoveredflashgames_desc: Detta är spel som var arkiverade från original sidan
play_recreatedgames_desc: Detta är spel som har blivit återskapade med ny kodning
play_partiallyrecoveredgames_desc: Detta är spel som var arkiverade från original sidan men som saknar vissa filer eller grundläggande funktioner.
play_newgames_desc: Detta är spel som har Bella Sara tema eller är Bella Sara inspirerade.
artstudio_warning: Detta spel saknar filerna till original hästarna och kan för tillfället inte ladda texten rätt.
babybella_warning: Detta spel/denna reklam verkar sakna några original funktioner.
lanceriding_warning: Detta spel har endast filerna för första nivån. Spelet har även problem med att ladda effektivt och därför kan det krävas att man laddar om sidan ett par gånger innan det funkar.
storybook_warning: I detta spel verkar man inte kunna stänga av ljudet när man går till nästa sida i boken. Videos spelas inte heller alltid som förväntat.
newmap_warning: The map is missing its styling files. Some links go to the wiki due to the games not being restored yet.
oldmap_warning: Some links are disabled due to the games not being restored yet.
belloquiz_warning: Due to the lack of references, this recreation may not be a 100% accurate.
puzzle_goCustom: Click here to make a custom puzzle with your own image
puzzle_custom_warning: Note that images larger than 700 x 450 may be too large to see correctly.
puzzle_custom_warning2: Images larger than 700 x 450 may not show completely!
stables_title: Welcome to the World of Bella Sara
babybella_timeline_information: This ad was updated multiple times over the course of its life. With this timeline you can now check how it looked at different dates.
babybella_4Sept: 4rd of September, 2008 - Petal's Birth / Start of the event
babybella_17Dec: 17th of December, 2008 - After the event's end
